title: Autumn sonata
brief_description: The reunion of an internationally famous concert pianist and her married daughter begins on a hopeful note, but too many old hurts and bitter memories conflict with their love for each other. Long-buried resentments between mother and daughter soon explode in a shattering confrontation of painful truths. Starring Ingrid Bergman and Liv Ullman.
